languages.text: Whenever this creature is attacked by an enemy, it suffers +<u>attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}</u>% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} of this attack is increased by +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>%.

traits.locale_text: Enemies attacks deal attackers PER additional damage and have +AGI Bonus to crit chance.

Whenever this creature is attacked by an enemy, it suffers +<u>attacker's PER</u>% more damage. The critical hit chance of this attack is increased by +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>%.

Whenever this creature is attacked by an enemy, it suffers +<u>attacker's PER</u>% more damage. The critical hit chance of this attack is increased by +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>%.

Whenever this creature is attacked by an enemy, it suffers +<u>attacker's PER</u>% more damage. The critical hit chance of this attack is increased by +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>%.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} of this attack is increased by +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>%.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} of this attack is increased by +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>%.

languages.translation_comment: Атаки других генокультистов по носителю маркера наносят (PER)% дополнительного урона и имеют +(AGI Bonus)% к шансу крита. Маркеры не стакаются.

languages.text: Cuando esta criatura recibe el ataque de un enemigo, sufre un +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} del atacante</u> % más de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}. La {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}probabilidad de impacto crítico{/g} del ataque aumenta un +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}</u> %.

traits.locale_text: Cuando esta criatura recibe el ataque de un enemigo, sufre un +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} del atacante</u> % más de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}. La {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}probabilidad de impacto crítico{/g} del ataque aumenta un +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}</u> %.

languages.text: この生物が敵に攻撃されるたび、{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を+<u>攻撃者の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}</u>%多く受ける。攻撃者の{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット率{/g}は+<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>%増加する。
languages.original_text: Whenever this creature is attacked by an enemy, it suffers +<u>attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}</u>% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} of this attack is increased by +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>%.

traits.locale_text: この生物が敵に攻撃されるたび、{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を+<u>攻撃者の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}</u>%多く受ける。攻撃者の{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット率{/g}は+<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>%増加する。

languages.text: 此生物受到敌人攻击时会受到额外百分比{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，等同于<u>攻击者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}</u>%。所有针对此生物的攻击，{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击率{/g}都会提高<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>%。

traits.locale_text: 此生物受到敌人攻击时会受到额外百分比{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，等同于<u>攻击者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}</u>%。所有针对此生物的攻击，{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击率{/g}都会提高<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>%。

languages.text: Wird diese Kreatur von einem Gegner angegriffen, erleidet sie +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}WAH{/g} des Trägers</u> % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}. Die {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Trefferchance{/g} dieses Angriffs erhöht sich um +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}BEW{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}</u> %.

Die {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Trefferchance{/g} dieses Angriffs erhöht sich um +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}BEW{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}</u> %.

languages.text: Chaque fois que cette créature est attaquée par un ennemi, elle subit +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} de l'attaquant</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires. Les {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}chances de coup critique{/g} de cette attaque sont augmentées de +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}</u> %.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que cette créature est attaquée par un ennemi, elle subit +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} de l'attaquant</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires. Les {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}chances de coup critique{/g} de cette attaque sont augmentées de +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}</u> %.

languages.text: Это существо получает на <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ВОС{/g} атакующего</u>% больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} от атак противника. {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}Шанс критического попадания{/g} таких атак увеличен на <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g}</u>%.

traits.locale_text: Это существо получает на <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ВОС{/g} атакующего</u>% больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} от атак противника. {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}Шанс критического попадания{/g} таких атак увеличен на <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g}</u>%.

Это существо получает на <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ВОС{/g} атакующего</u>% больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} от атак противника. {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}Шанс критического попадания{/g} таких атак увеличен на <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g}</u>%.

languages.text: Bu yaratık, bir düşmanın saldırısına uğradığında +%<u>saldırganın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ALG{/g} niteliği</u> kadar daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasara{/g} maruz kalır. Bu saldırının {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş olasılığı{/g}, +%<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ÇEV{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g}</u> kadar artar.
